2944:4544: keśo daityāntare bāle hrīvere ca pracetasi||
2944:4545: kīśo digambare proktaḥ kīśaḥ śākhāmṛge'pi ca ||
2944:4550: kleśo duḥkhe'pi rāgādau vyavasāye'pi ca kkacit ||
2944:4551: vaṁśo veṇau kule varge pṛṣṭhasyāvayave'pi ca ||
2944:4553: daṁśaḥ syāt khaṇḍane doṣe daṁśo marmaṇi kīrttitaḥ ||
2944:4559: dṛgdarśane locane ca dṛgbuddhau bīkṣake'pi ca ||
2944:4569: kapiśaḥ sihlake śyāve mādhavyāṁ kapiśī matā ||
2944:4584: nīkāśo niścaye tulye hatāśo nirddaye khale ||
2944:4591: palāśaḥ kiṁśuke śaṭayāṁ harite rākṣase'pi ca ||
2944:4593: patre palāśaṁ saṁveśaḥ śayane cāsane'pi ca ||
2944:4596: nirveśo mūrcchane bhoge nirveśo vetane'pi ca ||
2944:4603: karkaśaḥ paruṣe krūre kṛpaṇe nirddaye dṛḍhe ||
2944:4616: bhūkeśī valvajeṣu syād bhūkeśaḥ śaivale vaṭe ||
2944:4648: vṛṣaḥ syādvāsake dharme saurabheye ca śukrale ||
2944:4657: varṣaṁ saṁvatsare vṛṣṭau jambūdvīpe dhane viduḥ ||
2944:4658: prāvṛṭkāle tu varṣāḥ syuḥ karṣaḥ karṣaṇamānayoḥ ||
2944:4667: doṣaḥ syād dūṣaṇe pāpe doṣā rātrau bhuje'pi ca ||
2944:4678: tviṭ kāntau vyavasāye ca jigīṣāyāṁ rucau giri ||
2944:4679: viṭ vyāpane ca viṣṭhāyāṁ śuṣiḥ śoṣe vile'pi ||
2944:4701: kulmāṣo yāvake proktaḥ kulmāṁṣa kāñjike'pi ca ||
2944:4709: pradopaḥ kālabhede syāt pradoṣo doṣa iṣyate ||
2944:4754: śṛṅgārādau drave vīrye dehadhātau ca pārade ||
2944:4760: dāsī ceṭayāñca jhiṇṭayāñca rāsaḥ kolāhale dhvanau ||
2944:4765: bhāḥ prabhāve mayūkhe ca māḥ smṛtaścandramāsayoḥ ||
2944:4778: aṁsaḥ skandhe vibhāge ca kaṁso daityāntare smṛtaḥ ||
2944:4779: kāṁsye ca kāṁsyapātre ca mānabhede'pi kīrttitaḥ ||
2944:4799: surasaḥ syāt sumadhure parṇāse surasā'pi ca ||
2944:4808: autsukye ca samāsastu saṁkṣepe ca samarthane ||
2944:4831: jyāyān vṛddhe ca śaste ca havirhotavyasarpiṣoḥ ||
2944:4832: repāḥ syādadhame krūre kṛpaṇe'pi ca kathyate ||
2944:4835: varcco dīptau purīṣe ca varcco rūpe'pi ca kkacit ||
2944:4837: chandaḥ padye ca vede ca svairācārābhilāṣayoḥ ||
2944:4840: rodaśca rodasī cā'pi divi bhūmau pṛthak pṛthak ||
2944:4844: bhujo bale ca dīptau ca tejo dhānmi parākrame ||
2944:4847: rajaḥ parge reṇau tu rajavat parikīrttitam ||
2944:4852: śreyastu maṅgale dharme śreyān śaste tu vācyavat ||
2944:4861: uṣaḥ prabhāte sandhyāyāmuraḥ śreṣthe ca vakṣasi ||
2944:4864: nabho vyāmni nabhā medhe śrāvaṇe ca patadgrahe ||
2944:4865: ghrāṇe mṛṇālasūtre ca varṣāsu ca nabhāḥ smṛtaḥ ||
2944:4867: taro bale ca vege ca retaḥ śukre ca pārade ||
2944:4870: saho bale jyotiṣi mārgaśīrṣa - hemantayoścā'pi sahaḥ pradiṣṭaḥ ||
2944:4871: raho'pi guhye surate ca tattve maho bhavedutsavatejasośca ||
2944:4873: jyotiḥ prakāśe dṛśi tārakāsu jyotirdineśānalayorapi syāt ||
2944:4877: rākṣasīti ca daṁṣṭrāyāṁ rākṣasī rakṣasaḥ striyām ||
2944:4879: tāmasīti ca durgāyāṁ tāmaso bhujage khale ||
2944:4895: śvaḥśreyasañca bhadre syāt parānande ca śarmaṇi ||
2944:4916: smṛtā madhurasā drākṣā mūrvikā dugdhikāsu ca ||
2944:4948: sahā devīkumāryośca sahaḥ kānte sahā bhuvi ||
2944:4954: barhaṁ dale kekipicche gṛhāḥ patnyāṁ gṛhe smṛtāḥ ||
2944:4962: pṁ 80 lohastu śastrake lihaṁ joṅgake sarvataijase ||
2944:4971: guhā tu gahrare siṁhapucchayāṁ skande guho mataḥ ||
2944:4972: vāho bhujāyāṁ vāhastu mānabhede vṛṣe haye ||
2944:4974: mahī bhūmau mahī nadyāṁ maha utsavatejasoḥ ||
2944:4994: kaṭāhaḥ kūrmapṛṣṭhe ca stūpe ca mahiṣīśiśau ||
2944:5040: gandhavahā tu nāsāyāṁ vāyau gandhavaho mataḥ ||
2944:5051: akṣaḥ karṣe tuṣe cakre śakaṭe vyavahārayoḥ ||
2944:5055: ṛkṣamuktañca nakṣatre yakṣaḥ śrīde ca guhyake ||
2944:5058: munibhede drume vahnau dakṣo dakṣā bhuvi smṛtā ||
2944:5064: lakṣaṁ śaravye saṅkhayāyāṁ lakṣaṁ chadmani kathyate ||
2944:5070: cokṣo gīte śucau dakṣe tathā tīkṣṇamanojñayoḥ ||
2944:5110: iti śrīsakalavaidyarājacakramuktāśekharasya gadyapadyavidyānidheḥ śrīmaheśvarasya kṛtau viśvaprakāśe anekārthaśabda- paricchedaḥ prathamaḥ ||
2944:5123: ā pragṛhyaḥ smṛtau vākye āḥ syāt santāpakoṣayoḥ ||
2944:5125: i khede ca rūṣoktau ca kāmadeve tvanavyayam ||
2944:5130: u sambuddhau ruṣoktau ca śambhuvācī tvanavyayam ||
2944:5134: ṛ ṛ vākye cā'pi kutsāyāṁ devāmbāyāntvanavyayam |
2944:5142: ku pāpe ceṣadartha ca kutsāyāñca nivāraṇe ||
2944:5143: manāgalpe ca mande ca dhig nirbhartsananindayoḥ ||
2944:5146: aṅga sambodhaṁne harṣe punararthe ca kīrttitam ||
2944:5148: tiryak tiro'rthe vakre ca vihaṅgādau tvanavyayam ||
2944:5173: kiṁsvit praśne vitarke ca śaśvat punaḥsadārthayoḥ ||
2944:5190: ānantarye kutaḥ praśne pañcamyarthe ca nihnave ||
2944:5193: pañcamyarthe tataḥ proktaṁ pañcamyarthe ca śāsane ||
2944:5207: anantare ca kārtsnye ca saṁśaye ca prakīrtitaḥ ||
2944:5230: anu hīne sahārthe ca paścāt sādṛśyayoranu ||
2944:5237: nityārthe saṁyame cā'pi kṣepārthe'pi ca viśrutam ||
2944:5268: sāmprataṁ cādhunārthe syād yuktārthe'pi ca sāmpratam ||
2944:5272: kuṁ praśne'pi ruṣoktau ca prādhvaṁ namrānukūlayoḥ ||
2944:5279: alaṁ śaktau ca nirddiṣṭaṁ śaṁ kalyāṇe sukhe'pi ca ||
2944:5284: tūṣṇīkaṁ tu smṛtaṁ maune maunaśīle tvanavyayam ||
2944:5288: abhīkṣṇaṁ tu tathāpaunaḥpunye syāt santate'pi ca ||
2944:5291: kathaṁ praśne sambhrame ca prakārārthe ca sambhave ||
2944:5293: kimu sambhāvanāyāṁ syādvimarṣe ca kimu smṛtam ||
2944:5298: aye krodhe viṣāde ca sambhrame smaraṇe'pi ca ||
2944:5301: pra prakarṣe gatādyarthe duḥ syāt kaṣṭaniṣedhayoḥ ||
2944:5305: ābhimukhye bhṛṣārthe ca vikrame ca gatau vadhe ||
2944:5313: prāduḥ prākāśyavṛttau syāt sambhāvye ca prayujyate ||
2944:5324: niṣedhane'pi vīpsāyāṁ khalu māne ca kīrttitam ||
2944:5341: bhūyaḥ punaḥ punaḥ khyātaṁ prabhūtārthe tvanavyayam ||
2944:5351: hā viṣāde ca śoke ca duḥkhārthe'pi ca kathyate ||
2944:5356: hāhā duḥkhe huhū harṣe gandharve'mū tvanavyaye ||
2944:5357: he hai vyastau samastau ca hūtisambodhanārthayoḥ ||
2944:5367: kṣāntāḥ maṅkṣu śīghre bhṛṣārthe ca tattvārthe'pi kkacinmatam ||
2944:5379: etāṁ kṛtiṁ kṛtadhiyaḥ kṛtakṛtyabhāva - māpādayantu sadayaṁ,
2944:5381: nityaṁ maheśvarakaveḥ paribhāvayantaḥ santaḥ paronnatiratā hi bhavanti loke ||
2944:5386: iti śrīsakalavaidyarājacakramuktāśekharasya gadyapadyavidyānidheḥ śrīmaheśvarasya kṛtau viśvaprakāśe anekārthāvyayaparicchedo dvitīyaḥ ||
